snippet: Mr. Wale presided over a period of rapid expansion for G.M. in China, where the automaker increased sales from 560,000 units in 2005 to 2.5 million units in 2011.
abstract: Mr. Wale presided over a period of rapid expansion for G.M. in China, where the automaker increased sales from 560,000 units in 2005 to 2.5 million units in 2011.

headline.main: Kevin Wale, G.M. China President, to Retire
